Package com.dua3.utility.data

Class FileTreeNode<T extends FileTreeNode<T>>

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.data.FileTreeNode<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the node
All Implemented Interfaces:
TreeNode<T>
public class FileTreeNode<T extends FileTreeNode<T>> extends Object implements TreeNode<T>
Represents a node in a file tree.

  • Constructor Details

    • FileTreeNode

      protected FileTreeNode(@Nullable T parent, Path path, boolean lazy)
      Constructor for a node in a file tree.
      Parameters:
      parent - the parent node or null for a root node
      path - the path of the file or directory represented by this node
      lazy - if the child nodes should be lazily added to improve performance for collapsed subtrees

  • Method Details

    • tree

      public static <T extends FileTreeNode<T>> T tree(Path root)

      Parameters:
      root - the tree root
      Returns:
      the tree

      Create FileTree with the given path as its root.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the node type
      Parameters:
      root - the tree root
      lazy - if true, nodes are not populated before refresh is called

      the tree
